# Rambler&Co

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="240"
  height="400"
  type="capirs"
  data-begun-auto-pad="1212332"
  data-begun-block-id="5665768"
  data-custom-css="div[id^=begun_block] iframe{margin:0 auto;}"
  json=""
></amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For semantics of configuration, please see Rambler SSP documentation.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-begun-auto-pad`
-   `data-begun-block-id`
-   `data-custom-css`
